+@Composable
+fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
+ val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
+ val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
+
+ // Colors from the design
+ val backgroundPurple = Color(0xFF6B74F8)
+ val cardWhite = Color(0xFFFFFFFF)
+ val greenChip = Color(0xFF03A564)
+ val pinkFooter = Color(0xFFF9E2F3)
+ val primaryText = Color(0xFF13182C)
+ val secondaryText = Color(0xFF4C4F59)
+
+ Box(
+ modifier = modifier
+ .fillMaxSize()
+ .background(backgroundPurple)
+ ) {
+ Box(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxSize()
+ .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
+ .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
+ .background(cardWhite)
+ ) {
+ LazyColumn(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxSize()
+ .padding(20.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
+ ) {
+ item {
+ // Title
+ Text(
+ text = "Physics Crash Course",
+ fontSize = 28.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = primaryText,
+ textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ )
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Description
+ Text(
+ text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
+ fontSize = 14.sp,
+ color = secondaryText,
+ lineHeight = 20.sp,
+ textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ )
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Chips Row
+ FlowRow(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ mainAxisAlignment = if (isLandscape) androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Arrangement.Center
+ else androidx.compose.foundation.layout.Arrangement.Start
+ ) {
+ // Intermediate chip
+ AssistChip(
+ onClick = { },
+ label = { Text("Intermediate", color = Color.White) },
+ leadingIcon = {
+ Icon(
+ painter = painterResource(android.R.drawable.ic_dialog_info),
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = Color.White,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
+ )
+ },
+ colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
+ containerColor = backgroundPurple
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp, bottom = 8.dp)
+ )
+
+ // Science chip
+ AssistChip(
+ onClick = { },
+ label = { Text("Science", color = Color.White) },
+ colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
+ containerColor = greenChip
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp, bottom = 8.dp)
+ )
+
+ // Physics chip
+ AssistChip(
+ onClick = { },
+ label = { Text("Physics", color = Color.White) },
+ colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
+ containerColor = greenChip
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp, bottom = 8.dp)
+ )
+
+ // Duration chip
+ AssistChip(
+ onClick = { },
+ label = { Text("15 mins", color = secondaryText) },
+ leadingIcon = {
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = Icons.Default.AccessTime,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = secondaryText,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
+ )
+ },
+ colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
+ containerColor = Color(0xFFE5E5E9)
+ ),
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 8.dp)
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Divider
+ HorizontalDivider(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ thickness = 1.dp,
+ color = Color(0xFFE5E5E9)
+ )
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // What you'll learn section
+ Text(
+ text = "What you'll learn:",
+ fontSize = 18.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = primaryText,
+ textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Learning points
+ val learningPoints = listOf(
+ "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
+ "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
+ "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
+ "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
+ "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
+ )
+
+ items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start
+ ) {
+ if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
+
+ Text(
+ text = "→",
+ color = backgroundPurple,
+ fontSize = 16.sp,
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
+ )
+
+ Text(
+ text = learningPoints[index],
+ fontSize = 14.sp,
+ color = secondaryText,
+ lineHeight = 20.sp,
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
+ )
+
+ if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
+ }
+ }
+
+ item {
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
+ }
+
+ item {
+ // Footer with professor info
+ Box(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .background(
+ color = pinkFooter,
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
+ )
+ .padding(16.dp)
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
+ ) {
+ // Profile icon
+ Icon(
+ imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
+ contentDescription = "Professor",
+ tint = Color.White,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .size(40.dp)
+ .clip(CircleShape)
+ .background(backgroundPurple)
+ .padding(8.dp)
+ )
+
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))
+
+ Text(
+ text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
+ fontSize = 16.sp,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
+ color = primaryText
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ item {
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
+ }
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}

fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
 val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

 // Colors from the design
 val backgroundPurple = Color(0xFF6B74F8)
 val cardWhite = Color(0xFFFFFFFF)
 val greenChip = Color(0xFF03A564)
 val pinkFooter = Color(0xFFF9E2F3)
 val primaryText = Color(0xFF13182C)
 val secondaryText = Color(0xFF4C4F59)

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(backgroundPurple)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
 .background(cardWhite)
 ) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item {
 // Title
 Text(
 text = "Physics Crash Course",
 fontSize = 28.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = primaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Description
 Text(
 text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = secondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Chips Row
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = if (isLandscape) Alignment.CenterHorizontally else Alignment.Start
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 // Intermediate chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Intermediate", color = Color.White) },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 painter = painterResource(android.R.drawable.ic_dialog_info),
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = backgroundPurple
 )
 )

 // Science chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Science", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = greenChip
 )
 )

 // Physics chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Physics", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = greenChip
 )
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 // Duration chip on second row
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("15 mins", color = secondaryText) },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 painter = painterResource(android.R.drawable.ic_lock_idle_alarm),
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = secondaryText,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = Color(0xFFE5E5E9)
 ),
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth()
 )
 }
 }

 item {
 // Divider
 HorizontalDivider(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 thickness = 1.dp,
 color = Color(0xFFE5E5E9)
 )
 }

 item {
 // What you'll learn section
 Text(
 text = "What you'll learn:",
 fontSize = 18.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = primaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 // Learning points
 val learningPoints = listOf(
 "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
 "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
 "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
 "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Text(
 text = "→",
 color = backgroundPurple,
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = secondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = pinkFooter,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile icon
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier
 .size(40.dp)
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .background(backgroundPurple)
 .padding(8.dp)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = primaryText
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
}

package com.example.challangesetmay

import android.content.res.Configuration
import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.background
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape
import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Person
import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.Info
import androidx.compose.material3.*
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.compose.ui.draw.clip
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.ui.platform.LocalConfiguration
import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.text.style.TextAlign
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import com.example.challangesetmay.ui.theme.ChallangeSetMayTheme
import com.example.challangesetmay.ui.theme.*

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
 val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

 // Colors from the theme
 val backgroundPurple = BackgroundPurple
 val cardWhite = CardWhite
 val greenChip = GreenChip
 val pinkFooter = PinkFooter
 val primaryText = PrimaryText
 val secondaryText = SecondaryText
 val chipBackground = ChipBackground

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(backgroundPurple)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
 .background(cardWhite)
 ) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item {
 // Title
 Text(
 text = "Physics Crash Course",
 fontSize = 28.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = primaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Description
 Text(
 text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = secondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Chips Row
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = if (isLandscape) Alignment.CenterHorizontally else Alignment.Start
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 // Intermediate chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Intermediate", color = Color.White) },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Filled.Info,
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = backgroundPurple
 )
 )

 // Science chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Science", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = greenChip
 )
 )

 // Physics chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Physics", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = greenChip
 )
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 // Duration chip on second row
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text(" 15 mins", color = secondaryText) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = chipBackground
 ),
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth()
 )
 }
 }

 item {
 // Divider
 HorizontalDivider(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 thickness = 1.dp,
 color = chipBackground
 )
 }

 item {
 // What you'll learn section
 Text(
 text = "What you'll learn:",
 fontSize = 18.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = primaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 // Learning points
 val learningPoints = listOf(
 "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
 "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
 "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
 "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Text(
 text = "→",
 color = backgroundPurple,
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = secondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = pinkFooter,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile icon
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier
 .size(40.dp)
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .background(backgroundPurple)
 .padding(8.dp)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = primaryText
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Preview(showBackground = true)
@Composable
fun DefaultPreview() {
 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
}

import androidx.compose.ui.text.style.TextAlign
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview

import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import com.example.challangesetmay.ui.theme.ChallangeSetMayTheme
import com.example.challangesetmay.ui.theme.*

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
 val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(BackgroundPurple)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
 .background(CardWhite)
 ) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item {
 // Title
 Text(
 text = "Physics Crash Course",
 fontSize = 28.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = PrimaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Description
 Text(
 text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = SecondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Chips Row
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = if (isLandscape) Alignment.CenterHorizontally else Alignment.Start
 ) {
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
 ) {
 // Intermediate chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Intermediate", color = Color.White) },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Filled.Info,
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = BackgroundPurple
 )
 )

 // Science chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Science", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenChip
 )
 )

 // Physics chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text("Physics", color = Color.White) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenChip
 )
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 // Duration chip on second row
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = { Text(" 15 mins", color = SecondaryText) },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = ChipBackground
 ),
 modifier = Modifier.wrapContentWidth()
 )
 }
 }

 item {
 // Divider
 HorizontalDivider(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 thickness = 1.dp,
 color = ChipBackground
 )
 }

 item {
 // What you'll learn section
 Text(
 text = "What you'll learn:",
 fontSize = 18.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = PrimaryText,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 // Learning points
 val learningPoints = listOf(
 "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
 "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
 "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
 "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Text(
 text = "→",
 color = BackgroundPurple,
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = SecondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = PinkFooter,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile icon
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier
 .size(40.dp)
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .background(BackgroundPurple)
 .padding(8.dp)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = PrimaryText
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

 }

package com.example.challangesetmay

import android.content.res.Configuration

import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
import androidx.compose.ui.text.style.TextAlign
import androidx.compose.ui.tooling.preview.Preview

import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
 }

@Composable
fun ChipsFlowRow(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier,
 horizontalAlignment: Alignment.Horizontal = Alignment.Start,
 content: @Composable () -> Unit
) {
 Layout(
 modifier = modifier,
 content = content
 ) { measurables, constraints ->
 val placeables = measurables.map { it.measure(constraints) }
 var currentRowWidth = 0
 var currentRowHeight = 0
 var totalHeight = 0
 val rows = mutableListOf<List<Placeable>>()
 var currentRow = mutableListOf<Placeable>()

 placeables.forEach { placeable ->
 if (currentRowWidth + placeable.width <= constraints.maxWidth) {
 currentRow.add(placeable)
 currentRowWidth += placeable.width
 currentRowHeight = maxOf(currentRowHeight, placeable.height)
 } else {
 rows.add(currentRow.toList())
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight
 currentRow = mutableListOf(placeable)
 currentRowWidth = placeable.width
 currentRowHeight = placeable.height
 }
 }
 
 if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight
 }

 layout(constraints.maxWidth, totalHeight) {
 var currentY = 0
 rows.forEach { row ->
 var currentX = when (horizontalAlignment) {
 Alignment.CenterHorizontally -> (constraints.maxWidth - row.sumOf { it.width }) / 2
 Alignment.End -> constraints.maxWidth - row.sumOf { it.width }
 else -> 0
 }
 
 val rowHeight = row.maxOfOrNull { it.height } ?: 0
 row.forEach { placeable ->
 placeable.placeRelative(currentX, currentY)
 currentX += placeable.width
 }
 currentY += rowHeight
 }
 }
 }
}

 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Text(
 text = "→",
 color = BackgroundPurple,
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = SecondaryText,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = PinkFooter,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile icon
 Icon(
 imageVector = Icons.Default.Person,
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier
 .size(40.dp)
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .background(BackgroundPurple)
 .padding(8.dp)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = PrimaryText
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

The edit was successful with no linter errors."},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! Now the chips should behave correctly:

✅ **Intrinsic sizing** - Each chip only takes the space it needs for its content 
✅ **Proper spacing** - 8dp horizontal and vertical spacing between chips handled by the layout 
✅ **Smart wrapping** - Chips wrap to new lines only when there isn't enough space 
✅ **Responsive alignment** - Centers in landscape/tablet, starts in portrait 
✅ **Efficient layout** - In landscape/tablet mode, all 4 chips should fit on one line 
✅ **Natural flow** - Duration chip appears after Physics chip when there's space

The key improvements in the `ChipsFlowRow`:
- Uses `constraints.copy(minWidth = 0)` to allow chips to size themselves intrinsically
- Calculates spacing between chips properly
- Only uses full width when centering or right-aligning, otherwise uses natural width
- Handles both horizontal and vertical spacing consistently

Now the chips will display at their natural size with proper spacing and flow behavior!"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

@Composable
fun ChipsFlowRow(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier,
 horizontalAlignment: Alignment.Horizontal = Alignment.Start,
 horizontalSpacing: Int = 8,
 verticalSpacing: Int = 8,
 content: @Composable () -> Unit
) {
 Layout(
 modifier = modifier,
 content = content
 ) { measurables, constraints ->
 val placeables = measurables.map { it.measure(constraints.copy(minWidth = 0)) }
 var currentRowWidth = 0
 var currentRowHeight = 0
 var totalHeight = 0
 val rows = mutableListOf<MutableList<Placeable>>()
 var currentRow = mutableListOf<Placeable>()

 placeables.forEachIndexed { index, placeable ->
 val widthWithSpacing =
 placeable.width + if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) horizontalSpacing else 0

 if (currentRow.isEmpty() || currentRowWidth + widthWithSpacing <= constraints.maxWidth) {
 currentRow.add(placeable)
 currentRowWidth += widthWithSpacing
 currentRowHeight = maxOf(currentRowHeight, placeable.height)
 } else {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0
 currentRow = mutableListOf(placeable)
 currentRowWidth = placeable.width
 currentRowHeight = placeable.height
 }
 }

 if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0
 }

 val layoutWidth = when (horizontalAlignment) {
 Alignment.CenterHorizontally, Alignment.End -> constraints.maxWidth
 else -> rows.maxOfOrNull { row ->
 row.mapIndexed { index, placeable ->
 placeable.width + if (index > 0) horizontalSpacing else 0
 }.sum()
 } ?: 0
 }

 layout(layoutWidth, totalHeight) {
 var currentY = 0
 rows.forEach { row ->
 val rowWidth = row.mapIndexed { index, placeable ->
 placeable.width + if (index > 0) horizontalSpacing else 0
 }.sum()

 var currentX = when (horizontalAlignment) {
 Alignment.CenterHorizontally -> (layoutWidth - rowWidth) / 2
 Alignment.End -> layoutWidth - rowWidth
 else -> 0
 }

 row.forEach { placeable ->
 placeable.placeRelative(currentX, currentY)
 currentX += placeable.width + horizontalSpacing
 }
 currentY += (row.maxOfOrNull { it.height } ?: 0) + verticalSpacing
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
 val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
 .background(CardBG)
 ) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item {
 // Title
 Text(
 text = "Physics Crash Course",
 fontSize = 36.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 lineHeight = 40.sp,
 color = PrimaryTextColor,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Description
 Text(
 text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 lineHeight = 24.sp,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Chips Row with proper wrapping
 ChipsFlowRow(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = if(isLandscape) Alignment.CenterHorizontally else Alignment.Start,
 horizontalSpacing = 8,
 verticalSpacing = 8
 ) {
 // Intermediate chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Intermediate", color = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 17.sp, lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 painterResource(R.drawable.icon__2_),
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = PurplePillBG
 ), border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Science chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Science",
 color = GreenPillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenPillBG
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Physics chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Physics",
 color = GreenPillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenPillBG
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Duration chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Icon(
 painterResource(R.drawable.icon__1_),
 contentDescription = "Duration",
 tint = SecondaryTextColor,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp)
 )
 Text(
 "15 mins",
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = Stroke
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )
 }
 }

 item {
 // Divider
 HorizontalDivider(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 thickness = 1.dp,
 color = Stroke
 )
 }

 item {
 // What you'll learn section
 Text(
 text = "What you'll learn:",
 fontSize = 18.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 lineHeight = 26.sp,
 color = PrimaryTextColor,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 // Learning points
 val learningPoints = listOf(
 "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
 "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
 "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
 "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Icon(
 Icons.Default.ArrowForward,
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = TeacherPillBG,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile icon
 Icon(
 painterResource(R.drawable.avatar),
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 tint = Color.White,
 modifier = Modifier
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .size(40.dp)
 .border(1.dp, TeacherAvatarStroke, CircleShape)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = PrimaryTextColor
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

import com.example.challangesetmay.ui.theme.SecondaryTextColor

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 ChallangeSetMayTheme {
 LessonOverviewSheet()
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun ChipsFlowRow(
 modifier: Modifier = Modifier,
 horizontalAlignment: Alignment.Horizontal = Alignment.Start,
 horizontalSpacing: Int = 8,
 verticalSpacing: Int = 8,
 content: @Composable () -> Unit
) {
 Layout(
 modifier = modifier,
 content = content
 ) { measurables, constraints ->
 val placeables = measurables.map { it.measure(constraints.copy(minWidth = 0)) }
 var currentRowWidth = 0
 var currentRowHeight = 0
 var totalHeight = 0
 val rows = mutableListOf<MutableList<Placeable>>()
 var currentRow = mutableListOf<Placeable>()

 placeables.forEachIndexed { index, placeable ->
 val widthWithSpacing =
 placeable.width + if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) horizontalSpacing else 0

 if (currentRow.isEmpty() || currentRowWidth + widthWithSpacing <= constraints.maxWidth) {
 currentRow.add(placeable)
 currentRowWidth += widthWithSpacing
 currentRowHeight = maxOf(currentRowHeight, placeable.height)
 } else {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0
 currentRow = mutableListOf(placeable)
 currentRowWidth = placeable.width
 currentRowHeight = placeable.height
 }
 }

 if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0
 }

 val layoutWidth = when (horizontalAlignment) {
 Alignment.CenterHorizontally, Alignment.End -> constraints.maxWidth
 else -> constraints.maxWidth
 }

 layout(layoutWidth, totalHeight) {
 var currentY = 0
 rows.forEach { row ->
 val rowWidth = row.mapIndexed { index, placeable ->
 placeable.width + if (index > 0) horizontalSpacing else 0
 }.sum()

 var currentX = when (horizontalAlignment) {
 Alignment.CenterHorizontally -> (layoutWidth - rowWidth) / 2
 Alignment.End -> layoutWidth - rowWidth
 else -> 0
 }

 row.forEach { placeable ->
 placeable.placeRelative(currentX, currentY)
 currentX += placeable.width + horizontalSpacing
 }
 currentY += (row.maxOfOrNull { it.height } ?: 0) + verticalSpacing
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun LessonOverviewSheet(modifier: Modifier = Modifier) {
 val configuration = LocalConfiguration.current
 val isLandscape = configuration.orientation == Configuration.ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE

 Box(
 modifier = modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor)
 ) {
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(top = 40.dp) // Account for status bar
 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 20.dp, topEnd = 20.dp))
 .background(CardBG)
 ) {
 LazyColumn(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(20.dp),
 verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)
 ) {
 item {
 // Title
 Text(
 text = "Physics Crash Course",
 fontSize = 36.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 lineHeight = 40.sp,
 color = PrimaryTextColor,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Description
 Text(
 text = "The Physics Crash Course offers a foundational overview of essential concepts, teaching learners to understand Newton's three laws of motion, explain the principle of energy conservation, distinguish between kinetic and potential energy with real-world examples, solve basic problems involving force and mass, and apply the concept of momentum in everyday situations.",
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 lineHeight = 24.sp,
 textAlign = if (isLandscape) TextAlign.Center else TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 item {
 // Chips Row with proper wrapping
 ChipsFlowRow(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalAlignment = if(isLandscape) Alignment.CenterHorizontally else Alignment.Start,
 horizontalSpacing = 8,
 verticalSpacing = 8
 ) {
 // Intermediate chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Intermediate", color = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 17.sp, lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 leadingIcon = {
 Icon(
 painterResource(R.drawable.icon__2_),
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = PurplePillBG
 ), border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Science chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Science",
 color = GreenPillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenPillBG
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Physics chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Text(
 "Physics",
 color = GreenPillTextIconColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = GreenPillBG
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )

 // Duration chip
 AssistChip(
 onClick = { },
 label = {
 Icon(
 painterResource(R.drawable.icon__1_),
 contentDescription = "Duration",
 tint = SecondaryTextColor,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp)
 )
 Text(
 "15 mins",
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 fontSize = 15.sp,
 lineHeight = 24.sp
 )
 },
 colors = AssistChipDefaults.assistChipColors(
 containerColor = Stroke
 ),
 border = null,
 modifier = Modifier.clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 )
 }
 }

 item {
 // Divider
 HorizontalDivider(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 thickness = 1.dp,
 color = Stroke
 )
 }

 item {
 // What you'll learn section
 Text(
 text = "What you'll learn:",
 fontSize = 18.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 lineHeight = 26.sp,
 color = PrimaryTextColor,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 )
 }

 // Learning points
 val learningPoints = listOf(
 "Understand Newton's three laws of motion",
 "Explain the principle of energy conservation",
 "Identify real-world examples of kinetic and potential energy",
 "Solve simple physics problems involving force and mass",
 "Apply concepts of momentum in everyday scenarios"
 )

 items(learningPoints.size) { index ->
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Start
 ) {
 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))

 Icon(
 Icons.Default.ArrowForward,
 contentDescription = null,
 tint = BackgroundPurplePillTextIconColor,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 12.dp)
 )

 Text(
 text = learningPoints[index],
 fontSize = 14.sp,
 color = SecondaryTextColor,
 lineHeight = 20.sp,
 modifier = Modifier.weight(if (isLandscape) 2f else 1f)
 )

 if (isLandscape) Spacer(modifier = Modifier.weight(1f))
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 }

 item {
 // Footer with professor info
 Box(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .background(
 color = TeacherPillBG,
 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 )
 .padding(16.dp)
 ) {
 Row(
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 horizontalArrangement = if (isLandscape) Arrangement.Center else Arrangement.Start,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 // Profile image
 Image(
 painter = painterResource(R.drawable.avatar),
 contentDescription = "Professor",
 contentScale = ContentScale.Crop,
 modifier = Modifier
 .size(40.dp)
 .clip(CircleShape)
 .border(1.dp, TeacherAvatarStroke, CircleShape)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(12.dp))

 Text(
 text = "Dr. Eleanor Maxwell",
 fontSize = 16.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 color = PrimaryTextColor
 )
 }
 }
 }

 item {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(80.dp)) // Space for navigation bar
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

 val rows = mutableListOf<MutableList<Placeable>>()
 var currentRow = mutableListOf<Placeable>()

 val widthWithSpacing =
 placeable.width + if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) horizontalSpacing else 0

 if (currentRow.isEmpty() || currentRowWidth + widthWithSpacing <= constraints.maxWidth) {
 currentRow.add(placeable)
 currentRowWidth += widthWithSpacing
 currentRowHeight = maxOf(currentRowHeight, placeable.height)
 } else {
 rows.add(currentRow)
 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0

 currentRowWidth = placeable.width
 currentRowHeight = placeable.height
 }

 if (currentRow.isNotEmpty()) {

 totalHeight += currentRowHeight + if (rows.size > 1) verticalSpacing else 0
 }

 val layoutWidth = when (horizontalAlignment) {

 else -> constraints.maxWidth
 }

 layout(layoutWidth, totalHeight) {
 var currentY = 0
 rows.forEach { row ->
 val rowWidth = row.mapIndexed { index, placeable ->

 }
 currentY += (row.maxOfOrNull { it.height } ?: 0) + verticalSpacing
 }
 }
 }
}
